scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:main && pnpm run build:products && pnpm run build:users && pnpm run build:purchases
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd main && pnpm install && cd ../moduleProducts && pnpm install && cd ../moduleUser && pnpm install && cd ../modulePurchases && pnpm install
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "pnpm run dev:main" "pnpm run dev:products" "pnpm run dev:users" "pnpm run dev:purchases"
